original_text: There was a certain rich man, which was clothed in purple and fine linen, and fared sumptuously every day:
korean_text: 한 부자가 있어 자색 옷과 고운 베옷을 입고 날마다 호화롭게 즐기더라

sentences.original_text: There was a certain rich man
which was clothed in purple and fine linen
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자색 옷和高品质 아마布를 입고 있었고
